html:
543 U.S. 1118

LINGLE, GOVERNOR OF HAWAII, ET AL.
v.
CHEVRON U. S. A. INC.

No. 04-163.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 24, 2005.

1

C. A. 9th Cir. [Certiorari granted, ante, p. 924.] Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
